about_the_game:
- German language only –


Trolls in Rocky Beach? A teenager has disappeared and his sister suspects a kidnapping by a real troll. Who is the strange-looking man that not only little Elenya has seen? What is the story behind Mathilda's alleged lottery win? And who has devastated the house of Eudora Kretschmer?

Have the three ??? stumbled upon a parallel world and can they unravel all the intricacies down to the last detail? Investigate with Justus, Peter and Bob in a "trollish" case!

Help the three investigators with their case in this classic point & click adventure game: Question the inhabitants of Rocky Beach, collect clues, solve puzzles and always take a close look. Nothing here is as it seems!

• A new case for The Three Investigators
• Detective adventure including many locations and characters from Rocky Beach as well as new places
• With the voices of Oliver Rohrbeck, Jens Wawrczeck, Andreas Fröhlich, and some more narrators known from The three Investigators audio plays
• Explore many well-known as well as never-before-seen locations in Rocky Beach
• For players aged 10+
